blockers.title: Stripe key rotation before March 10th
blockers.action: Rotate keys in Stripe dashboard. Update .env, Netlify env vars, GitHub secrets.

blockers.title: Move GEMINI_API_KEY out of netlify.toml
blockers.detail: API key is baked into JS bundle via build config. Security risk.
blockers.action: Set GEMINI_API_KEY as Netlify environment variable in dashboard instead of netlify.toml.

blockers.title: Delete old Netlify site
blockers.detail: youandinotai.netlify.app still exists as orphaned site.
blockers.action: Netlify dashboard → youandinotai project → Settings → Delete.

blockers.title: Cloud Run not public
blockers.detail: GCP service account JSON on Sabretooth E:\ drive, not on T5500.
blockers.action: Run gcloud IAM command to add allUsers invoker, or copy service account key from D: drive.

blockers.title: api.youandinotai.com → verify EC2
blockers.detail: DNS points to AWS EC2 3.84.226.108. Need to verify EC2 instance is running.

blockers.title: WebSocket server for multiplayer
blockers.detail: v2 cosmic app needs Express+WS server on Cloud Run for multiplayer features.
blockers.action: Deploy server.ts from repo to Cloud Run.

blockers.title: FastAPI backend for user flow
blockers.detail: No backend yet for user registration, profiles, matching, verification, Stripe webhooks.
